original_text: the master of that servant will come on a day when he does not expect him and at an hour he does not know
korean_text: 생각하지 않은 날 알지 못하는 시각에 그 종의 주인이 이르러

sentences.original_text: the master of that servant will come
on a day when he does not expect him
and at an hour he does not know
